section.p: ‘Hear that melody, captain?’ asks the mate, his expression a mixture of fear and longing. ‘It is the song of the mermaids.’
It is an unearthly sound, beautiful but somehow terrible. Men must feel this way when, having drawn their last breath, they gaze on the lovely face of a Valkyrie.
